title: Fs: A few nice graded t206s

posts.post_title: Fs: A few nice graded t206s
posts.post_content:
Harry lumley psa 6mc (pied 150) corners are extremely sharp $95
hooks wiltse port with cap psa 5mk (pied 350460) tough common $70
george stovall batting (pied 350 460) sgc A, card looks nm $50
iron man mcginnity (pied 350) sgc A, card looks nm $125

scans available tomorrow morning....all 4 cards extremely sharp, thanks
